prompts.prompt_text: Professional e-commerce product photography of {{PRODUCT_MAIN_OBJECT}} {{PRODUCT_SIZE}} with {{PRODUCT_DISTINCTIVE_FEATURE}}, {{PRODUCT_COLOR}} {{PRODUCT_FINISH}} finish{{PRODUCT_TEXTURE_DETAIL}}. Front 3/4 view angle showing distinctive features and overall form. Pure white background #FFFFFF, centered composition with product occupying 85% of frame. Soft box key light front-left 45 degrees, fill light front-right 30%, rim light back 20% for {{MATERIAL_TYPE}} highlight definition. Ultra-sharp 8K resolution, commercial product photography, hyper-realistic {{MATERIAL_TYPE}} reflections, no text, no logos, no watermarks. Marketplace compliant.

Professional macro product photography extreme close-up of {{DETAIL_FEATURE_DESCRIPTION}} on {{PRODUCT_MAIN_OBJECT}}, {{PRODUCT_COLOR}} {{PRODUCT_FINISH}} finish showing precise detail and texture. Top-down 45 degree angle focusing on {{DETAIL_FEATURE_NAME}} revealing depth and dimension. Soft neutral gray background with subtle gradient blur. Rim lighting from behind to highlight 3D contours and {{MATERIAL_TYPE}} reflections, soft diffused key light front for detail visibility. Ultra-sharp 8K macro photography revealing craftsmanship quality, tactile desire aesthetic. Focus on unique design differentiator, premium quality.

Professional lifestyle product photography of {{PRODUCT_MAIN_OBJECT}} {{PRODUCT_SIZE}} with {{PRODUCT_DISTINCTIVE_FEATURE}}, {{PRODUCT_COLOR}} {{PRODUCT_FINISH}} finish, placed {{LIFESTYLE_1_PLACEMENT}}. {{LIFESTYLE_1_ENVIRONMENT}} environment with blurred {{LIFESTYLE_1_BACKGROUND}} in background creating depth. Natural {{LIFESTYLE_1_LIGHTING}} with {{LIFESTYLE_1_SHADOWS}}, {{LIFESTYLE_1_TONES}} tones. Environmental composition with product prominent in foreground, rule of thirds placement. {{LIFESTYLE_1_MOOD}}, {{LIFESTYLE_1_AUDIENCE}} aesthetic, {{LIFESTYLE_1_ENERGY}} mood. 8K quality lifestyle editorial photography.

Professional lifestyle product photography of {{PRODUCT_MAIN_OBJECT}} {{PRODUCT_SIZE}} with {{PRODUCT_DISTINCTIVE_FEATURE}}, {{PRODUCT_COLOR}} {{PRODUCT_FINISH}} finish, positioned {{LIFESTYLE_2_PLACEMENT}}. {{LIFESTYLE_2_ENVIRONMENT}} workspace with {{LIFESTYLE_2_PROPS}} visible. Professional lifestyle product photography of {{PRODUCT_MAIN_OBJECT}} {{PRODUCT_SIZE}} with {{PRODUCT_DISTINCTIVE_FEATURE}}, {{PRODUCT_COLOR}} {{PRODUCT_FINISH}} finish, arranged in cozy {{LIFESTYLE_3_CONTEXT}} composition.
